page.title: 04Local Schools
page.content: The primary school for the area is at { BUILDWAS}which is a small village school with two classes and 40 children aged from 5 to 11 years. They travel to school by mini bus. The other local primary school is at { {CRESSAGE}but transport is not provided for the children to go there from our area. Some children go to private schools in Wellington, the {OLD HALL SCHOOL} for primary age and {WREKIN COLLEGE for secondary age. Parents have to pay for their children to go to these schools. Children aged from 11 to 18 go to the {WILLIAM BROOKES COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL} in Much Wenlock. There are about 950 pupils at the school.
